name: RearmReleaseInitialize
description: Synchronizes branches, checks for changes, and initializes a pending release with ReARM
author: Reliza Incorporated

inputs.name: rearmApiKeyId
inputs.label: ReARM API Key ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Key ID for ReARM authentication

inputs.name: repoPath
inputs.label: Repository Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the repository (default: current directory)

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch name (defaults to current branch from Build.SourceBranchName)

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version string for the release (e.g., from GitVersion)

outputVariables.name: DoBuild
outputVariables.description: Whether a build should be performed (true/false)

outputVariables.name: LastCommit
outputVariables.description: The last commit from the previous release
